title: Tackle Box
summaries: The Tackle Box is an accessory that decreases the chance of bait consumption while Fishing. It is acquired as a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) chance reward for completing a Fishing quest for the Angler NPC, depending on the number of completed quests and other factors (for details, see Angler).
On average, the Tackle Box makes any given bait last one reel-in longer. For more details, see Bait Power.
The effects of the Tackle Box do not stack with the Angler Tackle Bag or the Lavaproof Tackle Bag.
The Tackle Box will not decrease the chance of a Truffle Worm being consumed when summoning Duke Fishron, there is always a 100% chance.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Angler will not give the player a Tackle Box as a reward if they already have one in their inventory or in any of their Portable Storages. However, if the player has a High Test Fishing Line, Angler Earring, and Tackle Box (or they have one of the accessories crafted from them, the Angler Tackle Bag or Lavaproof Tackle Bag) in their inventories, he will be able to give the player duplicate Tackle Boxes.
